title: Shielded in Broken Armours
description: When the Angelian attack on Demonis fails, Marzio Zain-Reil finds himself the prisoner - and guest - of the eccentric Prince Ignis Sagni-Dor. In the heart of Demonis, Marzio discovers a land unlike what he believed, and the love of a man with enough power and drive to reshape both their destinies. But what lies behind Ignis' desire for peace, and where will it lead them?
author: Alice Montrose
